settings.text: Our Purpose

Shock Doctor, the undisputed leader in mouthguard technology and the #1 mouthguard in the world, has become a leader in sports protection and performance around the globe. Our continual innovation in performance-driven and protective equipment is trusted by fearless pro and youth athletes. Shock Doctor products are worn by hundreds of professional and college athletes and available in more than 10,000 retail locations.

settings.title: We Take Athletic Performance and Protection to an Elevated Level of Excellence
settings.description: Not only do we lead the world in mouthguard technology, but we tenaciously extend that dominance every season -- providing advanced protective gear that helps you advance your game. Hundreds of thousands of athletes around the world gear up with Shock Doctor every day. It’s all about being fearlessly intelligent.

settings.text: Game-changing mouthguards and accessories that make you never look back.
The #1 Mouthguard in the world for a reason - best in class protection and performance.
Can't beat Shock Doctor's performance and quality - will keep you in the game!

settings.title: Protection. Courage. Swagger
settings.description: Shock Doctor, the undisputed leader in mouthguard technology and the #1 mouthguard in the world, has become a leader in sports protection and performance around the globe. Our continual innovation in performance-driven and protective equipment is trusted by fearless pro and youth athletes. Shock Doctor products are worn by hundreds of professional and college athletes and available in more than 10,000 retail locations.

settings.title: 1993 - EZ Guard Industries (First Sale)
settings.text: EZ Guard Industries (Shock Doctor) sells the first fully engineered mouthguard for $20

settings.title: 2002 - Gel Max Launches
settings.text: Shock Doctor launches the original version of our flagship mouthguard: The Gel Max

settings.title: 2003 - Braces Compatible Mouthguard Launches
settings.text: Shock Doctor launches braces compatible mouthguard

settings.title: 2004 - Shock Doctor Enters Into Core Protective Equipment
settings.text: Shock Doctor enters new category, core protective equipment, with the Ultra Carbon Flex Cup

settings.title: 2005 - Core Protective Line Extension
settings.text: Shock Doctor extends core protective line in apparel, launching core compression shorts and padded sliding shorts

settings.title: 2007 - Introduction of Gel Nano and Ultra Carbon Chin Straps
settings.text: Shock Doctor introduces the next revolution in mouthguards, the Gel Nano, as well as Ultra Carbon Chin Straps

settings.title: 2010 - Custom Mouthguard/ShockSkin Apparel Launch
settings.text: Shock Doctor Launches Custom Mouthguard and ShockSkin Apparel

settings.title: 2011  - Performance Sports Therapy
settings.text: Shock Doctor enters yet another new category, introducing Performance Sports Therapy.

settings.title: 2013 - Shock Doctor Acquires Cutters Brand
settings.text: Shock Doctor Acquires Cutters Brand

settings.title: 2014 - Recovery Compression Launch
settings.text: Shock Doctor launches Recovery Compression and Ice Recovery Compression Wraps

settings.title: 2015  - Merger of Shock Doctor and McDavid Inc.
settings.text: Shock Doctor and McDavid Inc. Finalize Merger

settings.title: 2016 - Max AirFlow Lip Guard Launch
settings.text: Shock Doctor launches Max AirFlow Lip Guard

settings.title: 2016 - New Global Headquarters
settings.text: United Sports Brands relocates global headquarters to Fountain Valley, California

settings.title: 2019 - New Logo/Rebrand
settings.text: Shock Doctor rebranded/refreshed with new look

settings.title: 2021 - Kool Aid Collaboration
settings.text: Shock Doctor begins licensed collaboration with Kool-Aid for flavored mouthguards and lip guards

settings.title: 2022 - Legends 7v7 Showcase Launch
settings.text: Shock Doctor launches Legends Showcase 7v7 youth and high school football tournaments series

settings.title: History Making
settings.text: Shock Doctor is about putting the athlete first. To that end, we have many gleaming first place trophies in our corporate showcase. Here are a few from our highlight reel.

settings.title: #1 MOUTHGUARD IN THE WORLD
settings.text: Our Mouthguards and lipguards are covered by a $30-$50K dental warranty.

settings.title: LEVELS OF PROTECTION
settings.text: We can help you find the right brace or support that works for you and aids in your recovery

settings.title: REVOLUTIONARY COMFORT
settings.text: Protective Cups Designed for athletes who prioritize protection without compromising on performance.

settings.title: ADVANCED COMFORT
settings.content: Shock Doctor’s advanced cups and supporters elevate core protection with cutting-edge technology. Paired with integrated supporters, briefs, and shorts, these products offer top-notch protection for all athletes. Shock Doctor ensures a comfortable fit for every athlete, helping prevent painful injuries.

settings.title: Trusted By Collegiate and Professional Athletes
